programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S3 Ep301
programme.desc: Paddington's Goo Monster / Paddington's Apple Pip Adventure - Paddington makes Goo but can he keep his promise to not make a mess when thngs get out of control? // Paddington and Simi go on a magical journey into the human body to see if an apple pip grows into a tree if you swallow one.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S3 Ep303
programme.desc: Blue's Mystery Present - At the Present Store, Joe's running a contest--whoever correctly guesses the mystery present on display gets to unwrap it! We play Blue's Clues to figure out what's inside this super special gift, and help customers pick out the perfect presents.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S1 Ep113
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Dinosaur Museum / The Crew Builds a Wheelchair Ramp - After uncovering dinosaur bones, the pups decide to build a dinosaur museum! // When Omar the Mail Carrier breaks his foot, it's up to the pups to make sure he can still deliver the mail by building ramps all over town.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S5 Ep517
programme.desc: The Blaze Family - Blaze and AJ are spending the day with some very special trucks: Blaze's family! His Mom, Dad, and little sister Sparkle join Blaze in a race against Crusher to prove they're the world's fastest family!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S1 Ep117
programme.desc: Santiago and Bonnie to the Rescue / The Compass Caper - After getting stranded at the bottom of a crevice, Bonnie and Santiago must team up to save the day. // Santiago is on a mad dash to get his compass back after it's nabbed by Bonnie Bones and Sir Butterscotch.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep109
programme.desc: Captain Kelp / Teensy the Tardigrade - As Super Shark and Captain Kelp, Baby Shark and William set out to save playtime-but is Captain Kelp just a sidekick? // Baby Shark adopts a teensy tiny pet, but is he ready for a big responsibility?

programme.title: Bossy Bear S1 Ep125
programme.desc: Save the Planet / Keytar All-Star / The Adventures of Randy Rock - Bossy and Turtle come up with a plan to catch someone who is not being envrionmentally friendly. // Bossy wants to perform a keytar solo but does not want to practice. // Turtle doesn't know how to best enjoy time with the class pet rock.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S7 Ep710
programme.desc: Pups Save the Big Bad Bird Crew / Pups Save a Soapbox Derby - Myrna the Mynah bird leads her feathered friends astray and it's up to the Paw Patrol to rescue the wayward flock. // Adventure Bay is holding a kids only soapbox derby race when a mysterious newcomer named ''Hum-Kid'' shows up and breaks the rules!

programme.title: Paw Patrol S9 Ep912
programme.desc: Pups Save a Lonely Ghost - Rubble dreams that he meets a ghost and learns that it's not easy to help a ghost make new friends.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S1 Ep114
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Splash Park / The Crew Builds A Playroom - With their splash park plans in troubled waters, the pups have to get creative to cool down the town for the summer. // As the pups work on building a surprise playroom for Lucas and Lily, a squirrelly visitor causes construction complications.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep108
programme.desc: Piggy in the Middle - Peppa teaches George how to catch a ball, and later, they play Monkey in the Middle with Mummy Pig.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S6 Ep621
programme.desc: Pirate Treasure - Pirate Peppa and friends put together a chest of treasure and bury it in a marked spot. Soon Pedro needs to follow the trail as he realises he has lost something.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S6 Ep622
programme.desc: Grampy Rabbit in Space - Grampy Rabbit visits Peppa's playgroup to talk about space rockets. The talk is going very well until suddenly Grampy Rabbit looses his voice. Can Doctor Brown Bear get him talking again?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S6 Ep623
programme.desc: Peppa's Circus - Grandpa Pig has put up a tent in his garden. Peppa and her friends decide it's a perfect place to put on a circus. With Peppa as the ringmaster, the show can begin!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep155
programme.desc: Ron's Sunburn - Ron has gotten a terrible sunburn and is too embarrassed to come outside and play with his friends. They try everything they can think of to get him to play with them. They even try tempting him with Froga's freshly baked cookies!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep156
programme.desc: Bubu's Portrait - Anna is painting a beautiful portrait of Bubu as a surprise gift. As she is missing a colour, she leaves the painting in the meadow for a moment. Meanwhile, Christopher arrives and finds the abandoned painting, he decides to take it to Bubu's.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S3 Ep302
programme.desc: Blue's Dino Clues - It's a prehistoric game of Blue's Clues when a mysterious dinosaur egg falls out of the skidoo frame and starts to hatch! We figure out what kind of dinosaur is inside the egg so we can reunite the egg with their family.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S9 Ep917
programme.desc: Pups Save Katie and Some Kitties / Pups Save Helo Humdinger - When Mayor Humdinger tricks Katie into watching his kitties, an alarm is set off and the Paw Patrol must rescue them. // Mayor Humdinger swipes one of Ryder's early inventions - an aircraft and must be rescued from an out-of-control flight.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S4 Ep408
programme.desc: Pups Save a Ferris Wheel - Mayor Humdinger steals Adventure Bay's Ferris Wheel.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep16
programme.desc: The Medicine Badge - Duggee's not very well, he's lost his voice. The squirrels want to make him feel better. Duggee tries to tell them that he needs some water but the squirrels don't quite understand.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep17
programme.desc: The Camping Badge - Duggee and the squirrels are going camping, so they build a tent. Then the squirrels hear a scary noise outside the tent. What can it be? All sorts of things are imagined. DUGGEE!!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep18
programme.desc: The Making Friends Badge - The squirrels make new friends, play games and have a picnic at a Jamboree. They meet another group of young animals with their very own version of Duggee but everything they do is different.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep19
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Sea Arch Escape - Xuli's flying race around the Academy inspires cadet Tala to fly the Grimbler. But she crashes into a fragile sea arch that could collapse right on top of her!

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep20
programme.desc: Go Jetters Academy: Ghost Crabs - Glitch takes all the sand from the Academy beach, leaving the local crabs with nowhere to hide from hungry seagulls. Can the Go Jetters repair the beach before it's too late?

programme.title: Kit and Pup S1 Ep23
programme.desc: Melting and Freezing - Pup is at the beach and Kit is in the snow. Can you see who has the melting ice cream and who has the frozen lolly? Kit and Pup are also helping a little investigator discover which food will melt and which will stay the same.

programme.title: Yakka Dee S2 Ep7
programme.desc: Bird - Dee encourages a friend to say 'bird' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure! We see lots of different birds including a swimming bird, a napping bird and even a rapping bird!

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep107
programme.desc: Straws - Big straws appear in Teletubbyland and Tinky Winky, Dispy, Laa-Laa and Po wonder what to do with them. The Teletubbies blow through the straws to make colourful bubbles.

programme.title: Teletubbies Ready Steady Go! S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Let's Do The Tubby - Join the dance party with the Teletubbies! Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po dance and sing and "Do the Tubby!".

programme.title: Clangers S2 Ep8
programme.desc: Star Flower - Small Clanger is fishing in the music boat and catches a beautiful silver seed. Mother and Tiny help him to plant it and it grows into a very shy little plant.

programme.title: Pop Paper City S1 Ep7
programme.desc: A Band for the Stand - Helping Hand builds a bandstand, so Mae-Mae decides to form a band with her friends.

programme.title: Tinpo S1 Ep9
programme.desc: The Amazing Fence - The Blockers are building a fence, but they accidentally create a maze. With one Blocker lost inside, can Team Tinpo help him find a way out?

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep31
programme.desc: Mayor Force One - Messy gets to fly Mayor Oki's plane, but he crash-lands it in a tree! Luckily, robots fly to the rescue.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep32
programme.desc: Vivienne Blows Her Top - Messy and his friends have animals to save and eruptions to stop in OKIDO when Vivienne Volcano gets a rumbly tummy. Oh dear!

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep18
programme.desc: Cubby House - Monty is disappointed to find the cubby house Stan built him is empty inside, until he begins to fill it with his imagination.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S3 Ep7
programme.desc: It's Time to Dress Up - JoJo and Gran Gran have fun finding Gran Gran's old clothes. When Charlene brings round a sewing machine, it's time for a Gran Gran plan - they can make JoJo some new clothes too!

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S3 Ep8
programme.desc: It's Time to Build a Nest - JoJo and Gran Gran spot a bird's nest in Cynthia's garden, which inspires JoJo to make a nest for Panda. Meanwhile, Daddy helps teach JoJo how to whistle just like a bird.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S2 Ep6
programme.desc: Tortoise Snooze - When it is time for Tortoise to hibernate, Sarah and Duck help him find a quiet place to sleep.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S2 Ep7
programme.desc: Fast Slow Bungalow - Flamingo & John give Sarah & Duck a tour of their house and invite them to play their favourite game...

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S23 Ep7
programme.desc: The Other Big Engine - While working on the Brazilian Railway, Thomas Meets Gustavo, another big blue engine who reminds him of Gordon back home.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S23 Ep6
programme.desc: Gordon Gets the Giggles - Gordon becomes very worried when he gets a serious case of the giggles. He must find a way to control his laughter before it does any damage.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep37
programme.desc: The Adventure - Princesses, horses and magic wands. Bluey and Chloe can play any role they want, when they embark on an adventure to save their playground kingdom from the Greedy Queen.

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep31
programme.desc: Broccoli Flies Again - Evil Pea asks for flying lessons when Broccoli flies her paper plane into her freezer. Evil Pea doesn't let Broccoli know that she intends to fly high to take over Tato Tower.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep15
programme.desc: The Pizza Badge - Duggee wants to try out his new pizza oven, so while he makes the bases the Squirrels each put on all the toppings they like best. Some of their combinations are... interesting!

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and accepted wisdom to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You wont find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of todays world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from Prove That Climate Change Exists to Who Will Win the Race to Space. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

RAZOR will show you the world's most powerful laser and the world's smallest anti-cancer treatment. It will take you from the weird world of quantum computing to the boundaries of the cosmos. RAZOR will show that we are already ""living in the future"!

programme.desc: Dokumentari mengenai "kraf tour" di tiga daerah di Utara dan Pantai Barat Sabah, iaitu Kudat, Kota Belud dan Tuaran. Dokumentari ini juga akan membawa penonton untuk mengenali lebih dekat etnik Rungus di Kudat, Bajau Samah dan Irranun di Kota Belud dan Dusun Lotud di Tuaran yang meneruskan pembuatan kraftangan peninggalan nenek moyang mereka sehingga berjaya menjadi usahawan kraf di bawah Kraftangan Malaysia.

programme.title: Dokumentari Khas: Menjunjung Kasih Tuanku (Rpt)
programme.desc: Kebawah Duli Yang Maha Mulia Seri Paduka Baginda Yang di-Pertuan Agong ke-XVI Al-Sultan Abdullah telah hampir lima tahun memegang tampuk kepimpinan negara sejak 31 Januari 2019. Duli-duli Yang Maha Mulia Tuanku Yang di-Pertuan Agong dan Raja Permaisuri Agong amat dikenali sebagai Raja berjiwa rakyat dan sentiasa mengambil berat tentang permasalahan rakyat selain menyantuni rakyat yang menjadi mangsa bencana, dalam apa jua keadaan sekalipun. Kini lima tahun kemudianrata-rata rakyat merafakkan sembah Menjunjung Kasih Tuanku.

programme.title: Dokumentari Khas: 2332 Kembara Kenali Borneo (New)
programme.desc: Dokumentari Khas ini memaparkan pengalaman Rombongan Diraja, Yang di-Pertuan Agong Al Sultan Abdullah Riayatuddin Al Mustafa Billah Shah dan Raja Permaisuri Agong Tengku Azizah Aminah Maimunah Iskandariah dalam perjalanan epik Kembara Kenali Borneo pada September 2023. Sejarah terpahat apabila Baginda berdua merupakan pimpinan tertinggi negara yang pertama berkenan mengadakan lawatan ke negeri yang terletak di kepulauan Borneo melalui lebuhraya Pan Borneo, merangkumi jarak perjalanan sejauh 2,332 kilometer. Bermula di Tawau, Sabah sehingga ke Kuching, Sarawak -- Kembara Kenali Borneo menjadi manifestasi keprihatian Rombongan Diraja terhadap kehidupan masyarakat, dan perkara ini juga dibuktikan melalui sambutan meriah rakyat yang pertama kali bertentang mata dengan Baginda berdua.

Duli-duli Yang Maha Mulia Tuanku Yang di-Pertuan Agong dan Raja Permaisuri Agong amat dikenali sebagai Raja berjiwa rakyat dan sentiasa mengambil berat tentang permasalahan rakyat selain menyantuni rakyat yang menjadi mangsa bencana, dalam apa jua keadaan sekalipun. Kini lima tahun kemudianrata-rata rakyat merafakkan sembah Menjunjung Kasih Tuanku.

programme.title: Dokumentari Khas: 2332 Kembara Kenali Borneo (Rpt)
programme.desc: Dokumentari Khas ini memaparkan pengalaman Rombongan Diraja, Yang di-Pertuan Agong Al Sultan Abdullah Riayatuddin Al Mustafa Billah Shah dan Raja Permaisuri Agong Tengku Azizah Aminah Maimunah Iskandariah dalam perjalanan epik Kembara Kenali Borneo pada September 2023. Sejarah terpahat apabila Baginda berdua merupakan pimpinan tertinggi negara yang pertama berkenan mengadakan lawatan ke negeri yang terletak di kepulauan Borneo melalui lebuhraya Pan Borneo, merangkumi jarak perjalanan sejauh 2,332 kilometer. Bermula di Tawau, Sabah sehingga ke Kuching, Sarawak -- Kembara Kenali Borneo menjadi manifestasi keprihatian Rombongan Diraja terhadap kehidupan masyarakat, dan perkara ini juga dibuktikan melalui sambutan meriah rakyat yang pertama kali bertentang mata dengan Baginda berdua.

programme.desc: Sr. 5 - Host Peter Maddison meets a feisty and resourceful couple who decide to trial a whole new way of building, using 31 steel shipping containers.

programme.title: What Broke The Rental Market?
programme.desc: As the cost of living goes up, nothing looms larger in our budgets than the roof over our heads. Casey Briggs looks at what an average wage gets you in some of the world's big cities, and lessons for our rental crisis.

programme.title: Things That Made Australia Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 2022 - Once dismissed by Henry Ford as a 'kangaroo chaser', the ute has become an Australian classic. It's part of life in the country and the city.

programme.title: ABC News Ep7
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Stephanie Borys presents the latest from ABC News, following today's top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, expert analysis and the updated news, sport, weather and information you need.

programme.title: The World This Week Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Beverley O'Connor brings you a weekly roundup of international news from an Australian perspective as reported by ABC News correspondents covering the Indo Pacific, Europe, North America, the Middle East, India and Indonesia.

programme.title: ABC Evening News Ep7
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - For the latest news as it happens ABC News is the home of breaking news, compelling stories and Australia's best investigative journalism. Mariam Saab presents the day's news and reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: Planet America: Fireside Chat Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Donald Trump wins the New Hampshire Primary over Nikki Haley, after Ron DeSantis drops out of the race for the Republican presidential nomination. Chas and John unpack the results ahead of Nevada and South Carolina.

programme.title: Australia Day Live 2024
programme.desc: As the sun sets on our national day, a Concert from the Sydney Opera House forecourt showcasing leading Aussie talent including Casey Donovan, Dami Im, William Barton, GANGgajang, Kate Miller-Heidke and Chocolate Starfish.

programme.title: Great Australian Stuff Ep4
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - We're a nation that loves to play, which is why it has given us memorable icons like Speedos, the Sherrin football, a dress made from polystyrene balls and our most popular museum attraction: a horse's heart. (Final)

programme.title: Alone Australia Ep11
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - After 50 days, only two remain. They have no idea how many others are left, let alone that they are the final two. The weather brings a change for the worse, and a change of strategy to survive could make or break them.

programme.title: Black Snow Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - In Ashford, residents gather at the local high school to unearth a time capsule from the 'class of 94'. Among the items is a letter from Isabel Baker who was murdered just a week before the time capsule was buried.

programme.title: War On Waste Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 3 - Craig Reucassel confronts Aussies about the amount of food we're throwing away. He gives the suburban street challengers some expert tips for ways to reduce food waste and uncovers the truth about compostable food packaging.

programme.title: Alone Australia Ep11
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - After 50 days, only two remain. They have no idea how many others are left, let alone that they are the final two. The weather brings a change for the worse, and a change of strategy to survive could make or break them.

programme.title: Connection To Country
programme.desc: Connection to Country follows a group of Indigenous people from the Pilbara as they battle to preserve Australia's unique cultural heritage from the ravages of a booming mining industry.

programme.title: ABC News Overnight Ep7
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - The final word on the day's top stories, with the latest news and updated information from Australia's most trusted source of independent news. Presented by Mariam Saab.

programme.title: The World This Week Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Beverley O'Connor brings you a weekly roundup of international news from an Australian perspective as reported by ABC News correspondents covering the Indo Pacific, Europe, North America, the Middle East, India and Indonesia.

programme.title: National Press Club Address Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - The Hon Anthony Albanese MP, Prime Minister of Australia, will make his first Address of the year to the National Press Club of Australia.

programme.title: Regional Roundup Ep6
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - We visit some of those impacted by one of the worst natural disasters in Australia's history, the chance of a lifetime: but how much would you pay to dig up a dinosaur? Plus the Aussie teen who took on a monster wave and won.

programme.title: Landline Summer Ep33
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - This summer, we bring you more of our favourite Landline stories from 2023. Farmers enjoy success with regenerative agriculture and dry-land rice farmers reduce methane emissions and water use.

programme.title: Indonesia Decides Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Indonesians are voting for their next president. We explore the controversial history of Minister of Defence and presidential candidate Prabowo Subianto, look at political dynasties, corruption and what young voters think.

programme.title: Project Wild Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Nature nerd, Dr Ann Jones travels through the Indo-Pacific region to find the dedicated people bringing our planet's amazing animals, plants and ecosystems back from the brink. This time Ann explores the Kingdom of Tonga.

programme.title: Weekend Breakfast Ep4
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Ease into your Sunday with an engaging mix of news, updated information, analysis, interviews, politics and weather. Presented by Fauziah Ibrahim and Celina Edmonds, plus sport with Jared Coote.

programme.title: Kitchen Cabinet Ep4
programme.desc: Sr. 7 - Victorian Senator Lidia Thorpe is one of the Parliament's most recognisable faces. Noted for her fiery ways, Thorpe also has a ribald sense of humour. Annabel delves into what has shaped her life and views.

programme.title: ABC News Ep8
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Stephanie Borys presents the latest from ABC News, following today's top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, expert analysis and the updated news, sport, weather and information you need.

programme.title: China Tonight: Summer Special Ep14
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Everyone loves leftovers, so we're re-heating some of our favourite stories. Sam Yang and Annie Louey look at China's culinary delights and how reality TV delivers a serious message about the real threat of food security.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon Ep8
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Stephanie Borys presents the latest from ABC News, following today's top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, expert analysis and the updated news, sport, weather and information you need.

programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Indonesians are voting for their next president. We explore the controversial history of Minister of Defence and presidential candidate Prabowo Subianto, look at political dynasties, corruption and what young voters think.

programme.title: Grand Designs Australia Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 5 - Georgina and Phillip buy the perfect block in Mount Eliza. All they need to do is build Georgina's latest creation - a slick, lightweight, modernist design with a schedule focused on one key ingredient, speed.

programme.title: Grand Designs Australia Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 5 - With three adult children, Ariane and husband Neil are ready to downsize - but Neil needs a little arm twisting. Ariane has found the ideal block - just 400 square meters in the conservative suburb of Claremont.

programme.title: Aussie Mavericks Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - From sheep breeder to shearer, grain trader to truck driver. She was raised to be a wife and mother. Instead, this woman has set up more businesses and tackled more jobs than many people do in a lifetime.

programme.title: ABC News Ep8
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Stephanie Borys presents the latest from ABC News, following today's top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, expert analysis and the updated news, sport, weather and information you need.

programme.title: Regional Roundup Ep5
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Australian farmers cash in on the push for sustainable fashion, feral animals threaten one of Australia's most iconic national parks, and we meet the young ringers with big dreams at the remote Borroloola bush rodeo.

programme.title: ABC News Ep8
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Stephanie Borys presents the latest from ABC News, following today's top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, expert analysis and the updated news, sport, weather and information you need.

programme.title: Landline: Asia Pacific Special Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - In Fiji, Landline reports on the growth in beekeeping and the management of varroa mite, plus the surge in kava farming and new products for the export market.

programme.title: ABC Evening News Ep8
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - For the latest news as it happens ABC News is the home of breaking news, compelling stories and Australia's best investigative journalism. Meredith Sheehan presents today's news and reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: Back Roads Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 10 - Heather Ewart heads to the New England region in NSW and the former gold town of Uralla. Now the locals are uncovering a different kind of treasure, finding riches everywhere and using that to invest in a sustainable future.

programme.title: ABC National News Ep28
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Wherever you are and whenever you need us, ABC News is here to bring you round the clock coverage of the latest news and today's stories. Plus reporters investigating issues that matter to you. Presented by Meredith Sheehan.

programme.title: Adam and Poh's Great Australian Bites Ep4
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - If you were to drop a pin in a map on any regional town in Australia you will find the three supporting pillars of Australian culture and cuisine: a pub, a bakery, and a Chinese restaurant.

programme.title: War On Waste Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 3 - Craig Reucassel looks at the environmental cost of disposable fashion. He meets waste warriors battling to rescue unwanted fashion items and goes undercover to find out where some of our recycled clothes might end up. (Final)

programme.title: Black Snow Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - After the discovery of Isabel's hair those involved with the time capsule project in 1994 are at the forefront of Cormack's investigation.

programme.title: Framed Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - "This is the Australian Cultural Terrorists. Remember us?". A phone call from the Picasso thieves promises to change everything. With so much at stake, can they be believed?

programme.title: China Tonight: Summer Special Ep15
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Sam Yang and Annie Louey take a look back at more of our favourite stories from China Tonight in 2023, exploring how technology and culture are changing the face of modern day China.

programme.title: Going Places with Ernie Dingo Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 4 - Ernie cruises the ancient waterways of Danggu Gorge, Aaron catches up with a talented woodcarver in Queensland's sugarcane country and Narelda tries her hand at natural horsemanship in regional Victoria.

programme.title: ABC News Overnight Ep8
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - The final word on the day's top stories, with the latest news and updated information from Australia's most trusted source of independent news. Presented by Meredith Sheehan.

programme.title: India Now: Summer Special Ep8
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Avani Dias looks at some of the issues in Indian society including why textbooks are rewriting history, the long shadow of British colonialism, how each sari tells a story, India's love of whiskey plus the secret of a spice.

programme.title: The Business: Summer Special Ep183
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - What will happen to house prices in 2024? In this special summer episode of The Business, Alicia Barry talks to economists, real estate agents and auctioneers about where house prices are going in the year ahead.

programme.title: Grand Designs Australia Ep4
programme.desc: Sr. 5 - A few years ago, Joe Cato and his wife Maura decided to slow everything down and spend more time with their children, but it didn't take long for them to hatch a plan to turn Foxground into their permanent home.

programme.title: Australian Story Ep14
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - A story of art, fame and family. The late John Olsen, one of our most beloved painters, had an obsessive focus on his work, often casting a shadow on those around him. John and family open up about art and the cost of fame.

programme.title: Four Corners Ep36
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Undercover operatives and secret informants have been crucial in the fight against organised crime. But what happens to these people who risk their lives once the operations have finished and the criminals are behind bars?

programme.title: ABC News Overnight Ep8
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - The final word on the day's top stories, with the latest news and updated information from Australia's most trusted source of independent news. Presented by Meredith Sheehan.

programme.title: National Press Club Address Ep41
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Malcolm Turnbull, Australia's 29th Prime Minister and Lucy Turnbull, Urbanist, Businesswoman, Philanthropist and Former Mayor of Sydney address the Press Club for the 2023 Australian Institute of Architects Griffin Lecture.

programme.title: Regional Roundup Ep5
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Australian farmers cash in on the push for sustainable fashion, feral animals threaten one of Australia's most iconic national parks, and we meet the young ringers with big dreams at the remote Borroloola bush rodeo.

programme.title: Landline Summer Ep34
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - All summer long we bring you our favourite stories from 2023. Italian and Indigenous cultures brought together at a hydroponic herb farm, plus enterprising equine vets in central Victoria are set to launch a 'foal ambulance'.

programme.title: News Breakfast Ep21
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Be the first to know the latest overnight developments, breaking news and the top stories this morning. Michael Rowland and Lisa Millar bring you news and interviews, joined by Bridget Brennan and Emma Rebellato.

programme.title: ABC News Mornings Ep21
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - When big stories break, turn to Gemma Veness in the mornings to bring you what's happening and why it matters. ABC News has more reporters in more places, serving and connecting communities and telling your stories.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon Ep21
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - The leading news at lunchtime. Ros Childs brings you the day's top stories and the latest news as it unfolds, with reporters in the community across Australia and around the world reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: Tom Gleeson's Secrets of the Australian Museum
programme.desc: For the first time, cameras go behind the scenes at the Australian Museum. Join Gold Logie winner Tom Gleeson as he discovers the labs, treasures and action leading up to their biggest exhibition ever.

programme.title: War On Waste Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 3 - Craig Reucassel looks at the environmental cost of disposable fashion. He meets waste warriors battling to rescue unwanted fashion items and goes undercover to find out where some of our recycled clothes might end up. (Final)

programme.title: Landline Summer Ep35
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - This summer, we continue to bring you some of our favourite Landline stories from 2023. Producing verified carbon positive cotton, plus high hopes for trials of hemp building products.

programme.title: Regional Roundup Ep5
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Australian farmers cash in on the push for sustainable fashion, feral animals threaten one of Australia's most iconic national parks, and we meet the young ringers with big dreams at the remote Borroloola bush rodeo.

programme.title: Afternoon Briefing Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Live from Parliament House in Canberra, Greg Jennett brings you everything you need to know about politics, national and global affairs, speaking with the key decision makers and stakeholders on issues in the news. (Return)

programme.title: ABC News with Joe O'Brien Ep21
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Joe O'Brien brings you a comprehensive summary of the day's events, with the latest breaking news, in depth coverage of the top stories, live crosses, interviews and explainers to bring you up to speed on what's going on.

programme.title: Grand Designs Australia Ep5
programme.desc: Sr. 5 - Melbourne doctors Ian Kronborg and Ann Howard want to create a home like no other - their plan is to build a three-storey house clad entirely with water tanks.

programme.title: Gardening Australia Ep13
programme.desc: Sr. 33 - We meet an arborist whose passion for ancient trees has seen him take up a new skill - making beautiful furniture from salvaged timber.

programme.title: ABC National News Ep29
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Wherever you are and whenever you need us, ABC News is here to bring you round the clock coverage of the latest news and the day's stories. Plus reporters investigating issues that matter to you. Presented by Joe O'Brien.

programme.title: 7.30 Ep13
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Sarah Ferguson presents Australia's premier daily current affairs program, delivering agenda-setting public affairs journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account. Plus political analysis from Laura Tingle.

programme.title: ABC News Tonight Ep21
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - More news, more often - the home of breaking news and in-depth coverage of the issues that matter. The ABC's network of reporters cover important stories and bring you news and information you need. Presented by Yvonne Yong.

programme.title: The Business Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Australia's leading daily business and finance show brings you up to date on market moves, economic trends and the forces affecting consumers, employees and business owners big and small. Presented by Kirsten Aiken. (Return)

programme.title: The World Ep17
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - At the new earlier time of 9pm AEDT, get to know what's going on in your world. Beverley O'Connor presents the latest international news with reports from ABC News correspondents and interviews with expert guests.

programme.title: ABC Nightly News Ep21
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Stay in touch with the latest breaking news and comprehensive coverage of the day's top stories. With reporters in more places, ABC News connects communities and tells the stories that matter to you. Presented by Yvonne Yong.

programme.title: Back Roads Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 10 - Heather Ewart heads to the New England region in NSW and the former gold town of Uralla. Now the locals are uncovering a different kind of treasure, finding riches everywhere and using that to invest in a sustainable future.

programme.title: Alone Australia Ep11
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - After 50 days, only two remain. They have no idea how many others are left, let alone that they are the final two. The weather brings a change for the worse, and a change of strategy to survive could make or break them.

programme.title: ABC Late News Ep21
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Know the latest on the day's top stories, as Jade Barker brings you a comprehensive roundup of the news of the day. ABC News has reporters across Australia and around the globe reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: 7.30 Ep13
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Sarah Ferguson presents Australia's premier daily current affairs program, delivering agenda-setting public affairs journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account. Plus political analysis from Laura Tingle.

programme.title: Tiger On The Rocks
programme.desc: The Tasmanian Tiger once roamed throughout Australia, leaving lasting connections with the land and its First Peoples. Multiple insights combine to throw light on Australia's most wanted animal.

programme.title: To the Point
programme.desc: Putins imperial ambitions: Is the West leaving Ukraine out to dry? - NATO is running its biggest military drills since the Cold War to practice how it would respond to an attack from Russia. But can it also keep up its support of Ukraine? Our guests: Milan Nic (German Council on Foreign Relations), Teri Schultz (DW), and Markus Kaim (SWP).

Now, shes preparing for her comeback fight while juggling training sessions, breastfeeding, and family life. But Soledad is also fighting against femicide in Mexico. She writes the names of murdered women on her boxing garb. "I don't want to lose a single woman more, she says.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 3 Ep3
programme.desc: Mencari Ramli adalah program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: UFC 297: Strickland vs. Du Plessis
programme.desc: Prelims - Fresh from one of 2023s most impressive performances, Sean Strickland will defend his UFC middleweight title for the first time on January 21, as he travels to Torontos Scotiabank Arena to battle South African slugger Dricus Du Plessis in the main event of UFC 297. Stricklands upset of Israel Adesanya came as no surprise to those in the new champs gym, and now hell look to cement his place atop the 185-pound weight class by defeating Du Plessis, who is perfect in six UFC fights. Plus, a new champion will be crowned in the womens bantamweight division, as Raquel Pennington squares off with Mayra Bueno Silva in a co-main event that promises fireworks.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night Ankalaev vs Walker 2
programme.desc: Prelims - A controversial score will be settled at the APEX in Las Vegas on January 14, and this time, light heavyweight contenders Magomed Ankalaev and Johnny Walker will have five rounds to handle their business in a UFC Fight Night main event. A no contest in the pairs October bout left many unanswered questions and, this time, the Russian powerhouse and the dynamic Brazilian striker square off in a rematch, with both determined to dominate and make their case for a shot at the 205-pound title
